title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Culture-Based Kazakh Heritage Language Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Kazakh communication skills and understanding of fundamental cultural contexts
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic conversations in Kazakh with 80% accuracy in everyday situations.
Learners improve cultural literacy assessment scores by 15% through VR simulations reflecting Kazakh traditional culture.
Learners record language use frequency with family/peers at least three times per week and develop report-writing skills.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
